name: The Littlest ScamBot
description:
***PLAY IN UNITY FULLSCREEN (BLUE ARROWS), IF FROZEN ON PAUSE SCREEN PRESS ESCAPE, MENU BUGS WILL BE FIXED POST-JAM***

This is a game where you play as a little cheating dice robot! Your character will fly in the opposite direction of where you click on the screen, which you can use to narrowly dodge spikes as you attempt to turn the dice over to the correct side as indicated by your partner in crime, but don't take too long, or you're gonna get caught!

SFX from Various OpenGameArt Accounts:

https://opengameart.org/content/fire-loop

https://opengameart.org/content/explosion-0

Another from free-stock-music:

https://www.free-stock-music.com/sound-effects-library-cash-register-sound.html

Music "Casino Man" by Spring Spring:

https://opengameart.org/content/casino-man
